title: Turn on loss prevented!

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
23-5 lead, i was so fed to 1v3 (vayne) and then half my team DCd.
turn on loss prevented if you see large group having this. i had 150ppl on in friendslist, after your server problem theres 9 ppl in it.
